mapper.insert:
insert into rawIssue ( uuid, type, category, detail, file_name, scan_id, issue_id, commit_id, repo_id, code_lines, status ) VALUES
( #{item.uuid}, #{item.type}, #{item.category}, #{item.detail}, #{item.file_name}, #{item.scan_id}, #{item.issue_id}, #{item.commit_id}, #{item.repo_id}, #{item.code_lines}, #{item.status} )
mapper.delete: delete from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category}
mapper.select: select count(distinct(issue_id)) from rawIssue where scan_id in (select uuid from scan where end_time < #{specificTime} and project_id in (select uuid from project where account_id = #{account_id}));
select * from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and status != 'solved'
select * from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and category = #{category} and file_name like CONCAT('%',#{file},'%') and status != 'solved'

select distinct a.* ,b.commit_time as commit_time , b.developer_email as developer_email from rawIssue as a inner join commit as b on a.commit_id = b.commit_id where a.issue_id=#{issueId} and a.status != 'solved' order by commit_time desc ;
select distinct type as types from rawIssue where category = #{category} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and status != 'solved' order by types
select count(*) from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and status != 'solved';
select count(*) from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and commit_id = #{commit_id} and file_name = #{file_name} and status != 'solved'
select file_name as 'key',count(file_name) as 'value' from rawIssue where commit_id = #{commit_id} and repo_id = #{repo_id} and status != 'solved' group by file_name order by value ;
select file_name as 'key',code_lines/count(file_name) as 'value' from rawIssue where commit_id = #{commit_id} and repo_id = #{repo_id} and status != 'solved' group by file_name order by value ;

select distinct a.* ,b.commit_time as commit_time , b.developer_email as developer_email from rawIssue as a inner join commit as b on a.commit_id = b.commit_id where a.uuid in (select distinct rawIssue_id from location where rawIssue_id in (select uuid from rawIssue where issue_id = #{issueId}) and status != 'solved' ) order by commit_time desc

select distinct(b.commit_time) as commit_time from (select commit_id from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and status != 'solved' group by commit_id) as a inner join commit as b on a.commit_id=b.commit_id where a.commit_id = #{commit_id} order by b.commit_time;

select distinct(a.commit_id) as commit_id from (select commit_id from rawIssue where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and status != 'solved' group by commit_id) as a inner join commit as b on a.commit_id=b.commit_id where b.commit_time < #{commit_time} order by b.commit_time desc limit 1
select uuid from rawIssue where commit_id = #{commit_id} and repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and status != 'solved';

select commit_id from scan where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and commit_time = (select max(commit_time) from scan where repo_id = #{repo_id} and category = #{category} and status = "done");
